p: The database also incorporates recent updates to these systematic reviews as well as unpublished country‚Äêlevel routine data and thus is the most complete database for HCV infection in the MENA region. All HCV prevalence measures were subject to a detailed quality assessment as described 9, 10, 13, 30, 31, 32, 33, 34, 35, 42 and as informed by the Cochrane Collaboration Handbook guidelines. 36
